Name: Paper Wizards
About the game: This game is difficult and challenging fast-paced action with ability to tailor your approach and construct your skills to match your own style, rely on your agility, destructive power or quick decision making skills to overcome all the challenges the game can throw at you. Features Include Ability crafting system, allowing for hundreds of combinations Challenging gameplay and difficult encounters Endless Procedural Levels 11 unique enemies with their own AI behavior and mechanics
